title: How do we get a PAX skin now
body:
Personally, I really want a PAX Sivir skin. I believe that many other people are also looking forward to a PAX skin such as PAX tf or PAX jax. However, the skin code card has been stopped long time ago.
What shall we do to get a PAX skin? Or there is absolutely no way to get a PAX skin nowadays?

replies.body: PAX Skins are retired,[ limited skins](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins) that won't become available in the future.  Codes for these are also expired, so don't fall for any ruse by someone claiming to have one!  We do have Arcade Skins though that might fill the need to press play.  :P  Let me know if that clears things up!

So that means, that they cannot be obtained as shards from Hextech Chests? 
If not, how about including them as craftable skins with the 10 Gemstone price.
When i was at Dreamhack i had my chance to play all the pax skins in 3 days since i was there! :D
